name: Wagner
desc: Mondstadt's blacksmith who despises small talks and prefers being left to his work.

customize.name: Silver Sword
customize.desc: A sword for exorcising demons. Everyone knows it's made of a silver alloy, not pure silver.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Old Merc's Pal
customize.desc: A battle-tested greatsword that has seen better days and worse.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Iron Point
customize.desc: Sharp and pointy at one end, it is a balanced weapon that is quite popular among travelers.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Pocket Grimoire
customize.desc: A carefully compiled notebook featuring the essentials needed to pass a magic exam.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Seasoned Hunter's Bow
customize.desc: A bow that has been well-polished by time and meticulously cared for by its owner. It feels almost like an extension of the archer's arm.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
You and the mineral cargo you were escorting to Mondstadt came under attack from hilichurls, and to ensure the safe passage of the goods, you drew your blade, freshly forged at the blacksmith...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: Your Support Zone starts with 1 "Wagner" card.</color>
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: Wagner can allow you to play Weapon cards for free. Get your character geared before you press the attack!</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Starting Lineup:</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Wagner
customize.desc:
Wagner, Blacksmith

"Smithing is not dependent on brute strength. You need the sweat on your brow from constant hard work, and perseverance stronger than the metals we forge!"

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
The boss of the Blacksmith in Mondstadt has meticulously set up the game, which appears quite neat and easy to understand. He is waiting for you to take an Adventure Challenge.

desc.text:
Message
"Hey, you! Yeah, you, the one reading this message."
"Add 'just like love' at the end of any sentence, and it will sound wise."
"Take my motto, for example..."
"Hard work is all there is to the craft! Just like love!"
Cat's Tail's reply
Cat's Tail is always here for you, no matter when! Just like love!

value.name: Wagner
value.desc:
Wagner, Blacksmith

"Smithing is not dependent on brute strength. You need the sweat on your brow from constant hard work, and perseverance stronger than the metals we forge!"
